title: Sudan: At least 32 including a UN official killed during attacks in a disputed region of Africa
description: Sudan: At least 32 including a UN official killed during attacks in a disputed region of Africa A South Sudanese radio station, Eye Radio Juba, quoted Abyei information minister Bolis Kuoch as saying 32 people were killed and 20 others wounded, "but the clashes have now stopped and the situation cal...
